cause.description:
Since the Islamic movement resistance is Palestine –Hamas- has totally ruled Gaza Strip the Egyptian government has closed the critical crossing point, thousand of Palestinian uses to get out of Gaza to the external world. This crossing point is the only one that can be used. The results of this inhuman from the Egyptian administration are
1- 6,000 Palestinians being stranded on the Egyptian side. 2- 29 dead. 3- 1500 patient with chronic dieses are suffering over there. 4- Children cannot go back to their mums.
1. Egypt should open the crossing point immediately.
2. this ossing point should never be closed
3. people should work for this human cause
cause.mission: request the Egyptian government to open Rafah crossing point
cause.name: Open Rafah Crossing Point
